emails.title: Requesting Information (Course Details)
emails.content:
Opening

Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to request some information about the English course advertised on your website. I came across your advertisement while searching for suitable language courses in my area, and I am particularly interested in improving my English skills for professional purposes.

Main Details

I currently work in international sales and need to communicate more effectively with English-speaking clients. The course description on your website suggests it would be ideal for my needs, but I would appreciate some additional details before making a final decision.

Action / Request

Could you please confirm the start date and the weekly schedule for the next intake? I would also like to know whether the course includes an end-of-course certificate that is internationally recognised.

I would also appreciate it if you could share information about the total cost, including any registration fees, and whether you offer instalment payment options.

Closing

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Yours faithfully,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Asking for an Extension (Assignment)
emails.content:
Opening

Dear Mr/Ms [Teacher Name],

I am writing to request an extension for the assignment that is due to be submitted on [Date]. I am fully aware of the importance of meeting deadlines, and I apologise for any inconvenience this request may cause.

Main Details

Unfortunately, I have been dealing with a family emergency over the past week, which has made it extremely difficult for me to focus on my studies. My father was admitted to hospital unexpectedly, and I have needed to spend considerable time supporting my family during this challenging period. While I have made every effort to keep up with the coursework, I have fallen behind on this particular assignment.

Action / Request

I have already completed approximately half of the work and am confident I can finish it to a high standard if given a little more time. Would it be possible to submit the assignment by [New Date]? This additional time would allow me to complete the research and ensure the quality meets your expectations.

I understand if this is not possible, and I am happy to discuss alternative arrangements if you feel that would be more appropriate.

Closing

Thank you for considering my request. I genuinely appreciate your understanding.

Kind regards,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Complaint About a Product
emails.content:
Opening

Dear Customer Service Team,

I am writing regarding a recent purchase made through your online store on [Date].

Main Details

I would like to raise a complaint about a laptop computer, order number [number]. I have been a loyal customer of your company for several years and have always been satisfied with both the quality of your products and the level of service provided. Unfortunately, on this occasion, my experience has been extremely disappointing.

When the laptop arrived last Monday, I immediately noticed that the packaging had been damaged during transit. Upon opening the box, I discovered that the screen was cracked and there were several scratches on the casing. Furthermore, when I attempted to turn the device on, it failed to start properly, suggesting there may be internal damage as well. The product was clearly not in the condition I would expect from a brand-new item.

Action / Request

As the item arrived damaged and unusable, I have been unable to use it as intended. I took photographs of the damage immediately and have retained all the original packaging as evidence.

I would appreciate it if you could arrange either a full replacement or a complete refund as soon as possible. Please also advise me on the returns process and confirm whether you will cover the cost of shipping the damaged item back to you.

Closing

Thank you for your assistance. I trust this matter will be resolved promptly.

Yours faithfully,
[Your Name]

I am writing to complain about a smartwatch, order reference [number], which I ordered from your website three weeks ago. I was initially very excited about this purchase as I had read excellent reviews about the product online and was looking forward to using it for fitness tracking.

Main Details

Unfortunately, my enthusiasm quickly turned to disappointment when the item arrived. The watch face had a noticeable scratch across the display, and the strap appeared to have been previously worn, as there were visible marks and creases. When I tried to set up the device, I also noticed that the battery would not hold a charge for more than a few hours, despite the specifications stating it should last several days. It seems clear to me that this item was either faulty, damaged, or possibly even a returned product that was sent out again without proper inspection.

Action / Request

As the smartwatch arrived in unsatisfactory condition with multiple defects, I cannot use it for its intended purpose and I am extremely dissatisfied with this purchase.

Please let me know the quickest way to return this item and receive either a replacement in perfect condition or a full refund to my original payment method. I would also appreciate confirmation that you will cover all return shipping costs, as the fault clearly lies with your company rather than with me as the customer.

Closing

Thanks for your support. I await your prompt reply.

Kind regards,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Applying for a Part-Time Job
emails.content:
Opening

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to apply for the part-time sales assistant position advertised on your company website last week.

Main Details

I am interested in this role because it matches my availability perfectly and would allow me to gain valuable work experience while continuing my studies. I am currently in my second year at university, studying Business Management, and I am looking for a position that will help me develop practical skills in customer service and retail operations.

I have previous experience working in a busy café where I was responsible for serving customers, handling cash transactions, and maintaining a clean and welcoming environment. This role taught me the importance of excellent customer service and helped me develop strong communication skills. I am confident, friendly, and enjoy working as part of a team. I am also very reliable and have never missed a shift without prior notice.

Action / Request

I have experience in customer-facing roles and I am confident I can contribute positively to your team. I am available to work weekends and two evenings during the week, which I understand fits with your requirements.

Please find my CV attached, which provides further details about my qualifications and work history. I would be happy to attend an interview at your convenience to discuss how I could contribute to your business.

Closing

Thank you for your consideration. I look forward to the opportunity to speak with you.

Yours sincerely,
[Your Name]

emails.title: Booking / Reservation Request
emails.content:
Opening

Dear Reservations Team,

I would like to request a reservation at your restaurant for a special occasion. I am planning to celebrate my parents' wedding anniversary and have heard excellent recommendations about your establishment from several friends and colleagues. They have all spoken very highly of both the quality of the food and the service provided by your staff.

Main Details

I have looked at your website and the menu seems perfect for what we have in mind. My parents particularly enjoy Mediterranean cuisine, and I noticed you have several dishes that I think they would love. I am hoping to make this a memorable evening for them, so I would appreciate any assistance you can provide in ensuring everything runs smoothly.

Action / Request

The booking would be for six people on Saturday 15th March at approximately 7:30 PM. If this time is not available, we would be flexible and could arrive slightly earlier or later if necessary.

Could you please confirm availability for this date and time? I would also like to know whether you require a deposit to secure the reservation, and whether you have any special dietary options available, as one member of our party is vegetarian.

Closing

Thank you for your help. I look forward to receiving your confirmation.

Kind regards,
[Your Name]
